verses.name: Matthew 14:30
verses.text: But when he saw the wind boisterous, he was afraid; and beginning to sink, he cried, saying, Lord, save me.

verses.name: Matthew 14:31
verses.text: And immediately Jesus stretched forth his hand, and caught him, and said unto him, O thou of little faith, wherefore didst thou doubt?

verses.name: Matthew 14:32
verses.text: And when they were come into the ship, the wind ceased.

verses.name: Matthew 14:33
verses.text: Then they that were in the ship came and worshipped him, saying, Of a truth thou art the Son of God.

verses.name: Matthew 14:34
verses.text: And when they were gone over, they came into the land of Gennesaret.
